name: exdistr
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, wff w0, wff w1
body: |- wb(wex(s0, wex(s1, wa(w0, w1))), wex(s0, wa(w0, wex(s1, w1))))

stmt.origin: exbii(s0, wex(s1, wa(w0, w1)), wa(w0, wex(s1, w1)))

body.origin:
|- wb(wex(s0, wex(s1, wa(w0, w1))), wex(s0, wa(w0, wex(s1, w1))))
-| wb(wex(s1, wa(w0, w1)), wa(w0, wex(s1, w1)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wb(wex(s0, wex(s1, wa(w0, w1))), wex(s0, wa(w0, wex(s1, w1))))
-| wb(wex(s1, wa(w0, w1)), wa(w0, wex(s1, w1)))

body.origin:
|- wb(wex(s1, wa(w0, w1)), wa(w0, wex(s1, w1)))
-| diffsw(s1, w0)

cumulated.origin:
|- wb(wex(s0, wex(s1, wa(w0, w1))), wex(s0, wa(w0, wex(s1, w1))))
-| diffsw(s1, w0)

comment: Distribution of existential quantifiers. See also ~ exdistrv . (Contributed by NM, 9-Mar-1995.)
